paths.summary: Search Hotels using its unique Id

description: 03237 | PROPERTY CODE NOT FOUND IN SYSTEM
11126 | NO PROPERTIES FOUND FOR RP/DI REQUESTED
03237 | PROPERTY CODE NOT FOUND IN SYSTEM
11126 | NO PROPERTIES FOUND FOR RP/DI REQUESTED

parameters.name: cityCode
parameters.description: Destination city code or airport code. In case of city  code , the search will be done around the city center. Available codes can be found in [IATA table codes](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) (3 chars IATA Code).

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Maximum distance from the geographical coordinates express in defined units. The default unit is metric kilometer.

parameters.name: radiusUnit
parameters.description: Unit of measurement used to express the radius. It can be either metric kilometer or imperial mile.

parameters.name: chainCodes
parameters.description: Array of hotel chain codes. Each code is a string consisted of 2 capital alphabetic characters.

parameters.name: ratings
parameters.description: Hotel stars. Up to four values can be requested at the same time in a comma separated list.

parameters.name: hotelSource
parameters.description: Hotel source with values BEDBANK for aggregators, DIRECTCHAIN for GDS/Distribution and ALL for both.

description: 03237 | PROPERTY CODE NOT FOUND IN SYSTEM
11126 | NO PROPERTIES FOUND FOR RP/DI REQUESTED

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the searched geographical point expressed in geometric degrees.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude of the searched geographical point expressed in geometric degrees.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Maximum distance from the geographical coordinates expressed in defined units. The default unit is metric kilometer.

parameters.name: radiusUnit
parameters.description: Unit of measurement used to express the radius. It can be either metric kilometer or imperial mile.

parameters.name: chainCodes
parameters.description: Array of hotel chain codes. Each code is a string consisted of 2 capital alphabetic characters.

parameters.name: ratings
parameters.description: Hotel stars. Up to four values can be requested at the same time in a comma separated list.

parameters.name: hotelSource
parameters.description: Hotel source with values BEDBANK for aggregators, DIRECTCHAIN for GDS/Distribution and ALL for both.

children.name: status
children.description: The [HTTP status code](https://www.iana.org/assignments/http-status-codes/http-status-codes.xhtml) of this response. This is present only in terminal errors which cause an unsuccessful response. In the case of multiple errors, they must all have the same status.

children.name: code
children.description: A machine-readable error code from the Amadeus Canned Messages table, that will enable the API Consumers code to handle this type of error

children.name: title
children.description: An error title from the Canned Messages table with a 1:1 correspondence to the error code. This may be localized

children.name: detail
children.description: An easy-to-read explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. It should give the API consumer an idea of what went wrong and how to recover from it. Like the title, this field’s value can be localized.

children.name: parameter
children.description: The key of the URI path or query parameter that caused the error

children.name: pointer
children.description: A JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request body that caused this error

children.name: example
children.description: A sample input to guide the user when resolving this issue

children.name: documentation
children.description: A link to a web page or file with further documentation to help the API consumer resolve this error

name: Amadeus_HotelSearch_byCity
description: Since the other Hotel Search is now V3, in order to get Hotel IDs, we need to get them through this API first...
about: Before using the API you will need to get an access token. Please read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization)** for more information on how to get your token.
